english.segment1: La da da da. La da da da. La da da da da da da da. La da da da. La da da da. La da da da da da da da
english.segment2: Spotlight glaring down. Silence from the crowd. The circus is just beginning
english.segment3: I tremble, looking around. I would hate to fall and hit the ground. In front of all these people. That wouldn't be pleasant
english.segment4: So the music plays. And the trapeze sways. And my heart is beating faster. But all I hear is laughter. From the crowd. Cause they see right through my gaze
english.segment5: Would you please tell me. What I gotta be. For you to want me. For you to want me, yeah. Cause I am. Just trying to understand. Why you don't love me. Why you don't love me for me
english.segment6: There is someone who loves you for you
english.segment7: I keep lying to myself. Trying to be somebody else. In front of all these people. I feel really foolish. And when the main attraction at the masquerade. If I keep goin' like this, I'm gonna go insane. Is this circus act all I'll ever be?. Yeah..
english.segment8: Would you please tell me. What I gotta be. For you to want me. For you to want me, yeah. Cause I am. Just playing a losing hand. If you don't love me. If you don't love me for me
english.segment9: There is someone who loves you for you
english.segment10: God loves you and me. Let me tell you it's the kind of love that's given free. And it doesn't fake. And it doesn't flake. And it doesn't play those games. God loves me and you. Let me tell you it's the kind of love. It's real, it's true. And it doesn't lie. And it's doesn't cheat. After it takes you off your feet
english.segment11: So just.. tell me. What I gotta be. For you to want me. For you to want me, yeah. Cause I am. Just trying to understand. Why you don't love me. Why you don't love me for me
english.segment12: Tell me. What I gotta be. For you to want me. For you to want me, yeah. Cause I am. Just playing a losing hand. If you don't love me. If you don't love me for me
english.segment13: (x2). La da da da. La da da da. La da da da da da da da. La da da da. La da da da. La da da da da da da da
english.segment14: God is someone who loves you for you
